subject: fix: only show PWA install button when native prompt is ready
body:
Remove blanket isMobile fallback from shouldShowInstall - previously
the install button showed immediately on mobile before Chrome confirmed
installability, leading to manual instructions instead of native dialog.
Now gates on canInstall (beforeinstallprompt captured) or Safari/Firefox.

title: only show PWA install button when native prompt is ready
